python_source: def f(x): m = jnp.mean(x, axis=0, keepdims=True); s = jnp.std(x, axis=0, keepdims=True); return (x - m) / (s + 1e-5)
jaxpr:
{ lambda ; a:f32[8,8]. let
    b:f32[8] = reduce_sum[axes=(0,) out_sharding=None] a
    c:f32[1,8] = broadcast_in_dim[
      broadcast_dimensions=(1,)
      shape=(1, 8)
      sharding=None
    ] b
    d:f32[1,8] = div c 8.0:f32[]
    e:f32[1,8] = jit[
      name=_std
      jaxpr={ lambda ; a:f32[8,8] f:i32[]. let
          g:f32[1,8] = jit[
            name=_var
            jaxpr={ lambda ; a:f32[8,8] f:i32[]. let
                h:f32[8] = reduce_sum[axes=(0,) out_sharding=None] a
                i:f32[1,8] = broadcast_in_dim[
                  broadcast_dimensions=(1,)
                  shape=(1, 8)
                  sharding=None
                ] h
                j:f32[1,8] = div i 8.0:f32[]
                k:f32[8,8] = sub a j
                l:f32[8,8] = square k
                m:f32[] = convert_element_type[
                  new_dtype=float32
                  weak_type=False
                ] f
                n:f32[] = sub 8.0:f32[] m
                o:f32[8] = reduce_sum[axes=(0,) out_sharding=None] l
                p:f32[1,8] = broadcast_in_dim[
                  broadcast_dimensions=(1,)
                  shape=(1, 8)
                  sharding=None
                ] o
                q:f32[1,8] = div p n
                r:bool[] = gt n 0.0:f32[]
                g:f32[1,8] = jit[
                  name=_where
                  jaxpr={ lambda ; r:bool[] q:f32[1,8] s:f32[]. let
                      t:f32[] = convert_element_type[
                        new_dtype=float32
                        weak_type=False
                      ] s
                      u:f32[1,8] = broadcast_in_dim[
                        broadcast_dimensions=()
                        shape=(1, 8)
                        sharding=None
                      ] t
                      g:f32[1,8] = select_n r u q
                    in (g,) }
                ] r q nan:f32[]
              in (g,) }
          ] a f
          e:f32[1,8] = sqrt g
        in (e,) }
    ] a 0:i32[]
    v:f32[8,8] = sub a d
    w:f32[1,8] = add e 9.999999747378752e-06:f32[]
    x:f32[8,8] = div v w
  in (x,) }

module @jit_fn attributes {mhlo.num_partitions = 1 : i32, mhlo.num_replicas = 1 : i32} {
  func.func public @main(%arg0: tensor<8x8xf32>) -> (tensor<8x8xf32> {jax.result_info = "result"}) {
    %cst = stablehlo.constant dense<0.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %0 = stablehlo.reduce(%arg0 init: %cst) applies stablehlo.add across dimensions = [0] : (tensor<8x8xf32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<8xf32>
    %1 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %0, dims = [1] : (tensor<8xf32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %cst_0 = stablehlo.constant dense<8.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %2 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %cst_0, dims = [] : (tensor<f32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %3 = stablehlo.divide %1, %2 : tensor<1x8xf32>
    %c = stablehlo.constant dense<0> : tensor<i32>
    %4 = call @_std(%arg0, %c) : (tensor<8x8xf32>, tensor<i32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %5 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %3, dims = [0, 1] : (tensor<1x8xf32>) -> tensor<8x8xf32>
    %6 = stablehlo.subtract %arg0, %5 : tensor<8x8xf32>
    %cst_1 = stablehlo.constant dense<9.99999974E-6> : tensor<f32>
    %7 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %cst_1, dims = [] : (tensor<f32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %8 = stablehlo.add %4, %7 : tensor<1x8xf32>
    %9 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %8, dims = [0, 1] : (tensor<1x8xf32>) -> tensor<8x8xf32>
    %10 = stablehlo.divide %6, %9 : tensor<8x8xf32>
    return %10 : tensor<8x8xf32>
  }
  func.func private @_std(%arg0: tensor<8x8xf32>, %arg1: tensor<i32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32> {
    %0 = call @_var(%arg0, %arg1) : (tensor<8x8xf32>, tensor<i32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %1 = stablehlo.sqrt %0 : tensor<1x8xf32>
    return %1 : tensor<1x8xf32>
  }
  func.func private @_var(%arg0: tensor<8x8xf32>, %arg1: tensor<i32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32> {
    %cst = stablehlo.constant dense<0.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %0 = stablehlo.reduce(%arg0 init: %cst) applies stablehlo.add across dimensions = [0] : (tensor<8x8xf32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<8xf32>
    %1 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %0, dims = [1] : (tensor<8xf32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %cst_0 = stablehlo.constant dense<8.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %2 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %cst_0, dims = [] : (tensor<f32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %3 = stablehlo.divide %1, %2 : tensor<1x8xf32>
    %4 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %3, dims = [0, 1] : (tensor<1x8xf32>) -> tensor<8x8xf32>
    %5 = stablehlo.subtract %arg0, %4 : tensor<8x8xf32>
    %6 = chlo.square %5 : tensor<8x8xf32> -> tensor<8x8xf32>
    %7 = stablehlo.convert %arg1 : (tensor<i32>) -> tensor<f32>
    %cst_1 = stablehlo.constant dense<8.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %8 = stablehlo.subtract %cst_1, %7 : tensor<f32>
    %cst_2 = stablehlo.constant dense<0.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %9 = stablehlo.reduce(%6 init: %cst_2) applies stablehlo.add across dimensions = [0] : (tensor<8x8xf32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<8xf32>
    %10 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %9, dims = [1] : (tensor<8xf32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %11 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %8, dims = [] : (tensor<f32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %12 = stablehlo.divide %10, %11 : tensor<1x8xf32>
    %cst_3 = stablehlo.constant dense<0.000000e+00> : tensor<f32>
    %13 = stablehlo.compare  GT, %8, %cst_3,  FLOAT : (tensor<f32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<i1>
    %cst_4 = stablehlo.constant dense<0x7FC00000> : tensor<f32>
    %14 = call @_where(%13, %12, %cst_4) : (tensor<i1>, tensor<1x8xf32>, tensor<f32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    return %14 : tensor<1x8xf32>
  }
  func.func private @_where(%arg0: tensor<i1>, %arg1: tensor<1x8xf32>, %arg2: tensor<f32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32> {
    %0 = stablehlo.convert %arg2 : tensor<f32>
    %1 = stablehlo.broadcast_in_dim %0, dims = [] : (tensor<f32>) -> tensor<1x8xf32>
    %2 = stablehlo.select %arg0, %arg1, %1 : tensor<i1>, tensor<1x8xf32>
    return %2 : tensor<1x8xf32>
  }
}
